translation.title: The Interior Is Impermanent in the Present

next.name: The Interior as Suffering in the Three Times

previous.name: The Interior Will Be Impermanent in the Future

segments.en: 188. The Interior Is Impermanent in the Present

segments.pli: “Cakkhu, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ paccuppannaṃ … pe … jivhā aniccā paccuppannā … pe … mano anicco paccuppanno.
segments.en: “Mendicants, in the present the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are impermanent …”

sections.title: “Mendicants, in the present the eye, ear, nose, tongue,…

suttaplex.translated_title: The Interior Is Impermanent in the Present
